source.1f017e4d: Happiness score is strongly correlated to 1.GDP per capita, 2.Life expectancy, 3.Social support. Surprising factor is that generosity is negativelty correlated to happiness score. Are all psychologists wrong? Also more the perception of corruption lesser the happiness score.
source.161b62f4: Well the outcome is indeed shocking, the jury has continuously degraded India's happiness score even tough the counrtry has almost all the positive signs for the increase or at least a stable score. Hence the general trend seems not be followed in the case of India.
